cn.9: 昨天有效订单收入总和。包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单，不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。增长率=（昨天有效订单收入-前天有效订单收入）/前天有效订单收入*100%。
cn.13:
昨天有效订单累计销售数量。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单，不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
增长率=（昨天订单销量-前天订单销量）/前天订单销量*100%
cn.16:
昨日有效订单所属的用户数量总和。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单，不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
增长率=（昨天下单用户数量-前天下单用户数量）/前天下单用户数量*100%
cn.19:
昨天订单均价=昨天订单收入总和/昨天订单销量。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单；
不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
增长率=（昨天订单均价-前天订单均价）/前天订单均价*100%。
cn.22:
昨天人均消费额=昨天订单收入总和/昨天下单用户数量。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单，不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
增长率=（昨天用户人均消费额-前天昨日人均消费额）/前天用户人均消费额*100%
cn.32:
展示全部订单（包括已取消的订单）收入总金额排名前五的店铺。
切换图例可单独查看有效订单收入/取消订单收入总金额。
全部订单总收入=有效订单总收入+取消订单总金额
cn.37: 展示累计消费金额排名前10的买家姓名，按照消费金额递减排序，同时展示高消费买家在平台的分布情况（已剔除取消订单）。
cn.40: 展示买家在同一平台不同店铺的有效订单的消费金额汇总。
cn.42: 展示买家在同一平台不同店铺的有效订单的数量汇总。
cn.45: 展示销售总金额（取有效订单中，商品的折后金额）排名前五的 平台SKU和系统SKU。
cn.51:
展示Channel SKU 在所有有效订单中折扣后的销售金额总和。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单，
不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
cn.52: 展示Master SKU在手工订单中的折扣后的销售金额总和+Master SKU 所绑定的所有channel SKU的折扣后的销售金额总和 。（仅针对有效订单）
cn.54:
展示channel SKU 在所有有效订单的销售数量总和。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单；
不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
cn.55: 展示Master SKU在手工订单中的销售数量总和+Master SKU 所绑定的所有channel SKU的销售数量总和 。（仅针对有效订单）
cn.59:
展示全部订单收入总金额。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败以及 已取消状态的订单；
不包含待支付的订单。
全部订单总收入=有效订单总收入+取消订单总金额
cn.61:
展示所有订单累计销售数量。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败、已取消状态的订单；
不包含待支付订单。
cn.63:
展示有效订单收入总金额。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单；
不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
cn.65:
展示有效订单累计销售数量。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单；
不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
cn.67:
展示取消订单总金额。
仅包含已取消状态的订单。
cn.69:
展示已取消订单累计销售数量。
仅包含已取消状态的订单。
cn.71: 展示Master SKU在手工订单中的折扣后的销售金额总和+所有channel SKU的折扣后的销售金额总和 。（仅针对有效订单）
cn.73: 展示Master SKU在手工订单中的销售数量总和+所有channel SKU的销售数量总和 。（仅针对有效订单）
cn.75:
用户人均消费额=有效订单总金额/有效订单用户数量总和
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单；
不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
cn.77:
有效订单所属的用户数量总和。
包含待接受、待处理、已处理、运输中、已完成、取消中、失败状态的订单；
不包含待支付、已取消状态的订单。
cn.86: 订单均价=有效订单总收入/有效订单总数量
cn.87: 授权店铺您就可以查看销售分析报表了！快快行动吧

us.9:
The total revenue from yesterday’s valid orders.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
Rate = (Yesterday's Revenue - The day before yesterday's Revenue) / The day before yesterday's Revenue * 100%.
us.13:
The cumulative sales quantity of valid orders yesterday.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
Rate = (Yesterday's Orders – The day before yesterday's Orders) / The day before yesterday's Orders * 100%
us.16:
The total number of users whose valid orders belong to yesterday.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
Rate = (Yesterday's Users - The day before yesterday's Users) / The day before yesterday's Users * 100%
us.18:
Yesterday's Average Order Price = Yesterday's Revenue / Yesterday's Orders.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
Rate = (Yesterday's Average Order Price - The day before yesterday's Average Order Price) / The day before yesterday's Average Order Price * 100%.
us.19:
Yesterday's Average Order Price = Yesterday's Revenue / Yesterday's Orders.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
Rate = (Yesterday's Average Order Price - The day before yesterday's Average Order Price) / The day before yesterday's Average Order Price * 100%.
us.20: The day before yesterday's Average Order Price
us.22:
Yesterday's Unit Sales by User = Yesterday's Revenue / Yesterday's Users.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
Rate = (Yesterday's Unit Sales by User  - The day before yesterday's Unit Sales by User) / The day before yesterday's Unit Sales by User * 100%
us.23: The day before yesterday's Unit Sales by User
us.32:
Displays the top 5 shops by total revenue from all orders (including canceled orders).
Switch the legend to view the total amount of Valid Order Sales / Cancel Order Sales.
Total Order Sales = Valid Order Sales + Cancel Order Sales.
us.37: Display the names of the top 10 buyers with cumulative spending amount, sorted in descending order by spending amount, and also display the distribution of high-spending buyers on the platform (excluded canceled orders).
us.40: Displays the summary of the buyer's spending amount of valid orders in different shops on the same channel.
us.42: Displays a summary of the number of valid orders placed by buyers in different shops on the same channel.
us.45: Display the top 5 Channel SKU and Master SKU in product of total sales amount (take the discounted amount of the product in the valid order).
us.51:
Displays the sum of the discounted sales amount of Channel SKU in all valid orders.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
us.52: Displays the sum of the discounted sales amount of the Master SKU in manual orders + the sum of the discounted sales amount of all channel SKUs bound to the Master SKU (Only for valid orders).
us.54:
Displays the total sales quantity of Channel SKU in all valid orders.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
us.55: Displays the total sales quantity of Master SKU in manual orders + the total sales quantity of all channel SKUs bound to Master SKU. (Only for valid orders)
us.59:
By total revenue from all orders (including canceled orders).
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, Canceled and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid statuses.
Total Order Sales= Valid Order Sales  + Cancel Order Sales.
us.61:
Displays the cumulative sales quantity of all orders.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, Canceled and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid statuses.
Total Order Sales= Valid Order Sales  + Cancel Order Sales.
us.63:
Displays the total amount of valid order revenue.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
us.65:
Displays the cumulative sales quantity of valid orders.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
us.67:
Display the total amount of canceled orders.
Only included cancel status orders.
us.69:
Displays the cumulative sales quantity of canceled orders.
Only included cancel status orders.
us.71: Displays the sum of the discounted sales amount of Master SKU in manual orders + the sum of the discounted sales amount of all channel SKUs. (Only for valid orders)
us.73: Displays the total sales quantity of Master SKU in manual orders + the total sales quantity of all channel SKUs. (Only for valid orders)
us.75:
Unit Sales by User =Valid Order Sales /Valid Orders
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
us.77:
The total number of users to whom valid orders belong.
Includes orders in To Accept, To Process, Processed, On Shipment, Completed, Cancelling, and Failed statuses, but does not include orders in Unpaid and Canceled statuses.
us.86: Average Price of Valid Order=Valid Order Sales / Valid Orders
us.87: Hurry up and integrate your shops to view the sales analysis report ！

id.9:
Total pendapatan dari pesanan kemarin (H-1) yang valid. Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
Rumus = (Pendapatan Kemarin - Pendapatan Kemarin Lusa) / Pendapatan Kemarin Lusa * 100%.
id.13:
Total akumulasi penjualan dari pesanan kemarin (H-1) yang valid.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
Rumus = (Pendapatan Kemarin - Pendapatan Kemarin Lusa) / Pendapatan Kemarin Lusa * 100%.
id.16:
Total pengguna dengan pesanan yang valid kemarin (H-1).
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
Rumus = (Pengguna Kemarin - Pengguna Kemarin Lusa) / Pengguna Kemarin Lusa * 100%.
id.19:
Harga Rata-rata Pesanan Kemarin = Pendapatan Kemarin / Pesanan Kemarin.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
Rumus = (Harga Rata-rata Pesanan Kemarin - Harga Rata-rata Pesanan Kemarin Lusa) / Harga Rata-rata Pesanan Kemarin Lusa * 100%
id.22:
Penjualan Unit Kemarin berdasarkan Pengguna = Pendapatan Kemarin / Pengguna Kemarin.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
Rumus = (Penjualan Unit Kemarin berdasarkan Pengguna - Penjualan Unit Kemarin Lusa berdasarkan Pengguna) / Penjualan Unit Kemarin Lusa berdasarkan Pengguna * 100%
id.23: Penjualan Unit Kemarin Lusa berdasarkan Pengguna
id.32:
Menampilkan 5 toko teratas berdasarkan total pendapatan dari semua pesanan (termasuk pesanan dibatalkan).
Ganti legend untuk melihat total dari Nominal Pesanan Valid / Nominal Pesanan Dibatalkan.
Total Nominal Pesanan = Nominal Pesanan Valid + Nominal Pesanan Dibatalkan.
id.37: Menampilkan nama 10 pembeli teratas dengan akumulasi jumlah pembelanjaan, diurutkan berdasarkan nominal pembelanjaan tertinggi, dan menampilkan distribusi pembeli dengan pembelanjaan bernilai tinggi di platform (tidak termasuk pesanan yang dibatalkan).
id.40: Menampilkan ringkasan jumlah pembelanjaan pembeli atas pesanan valid di beberapa toko berbeda di channel yang sama.
id.42: Menampilkan ringkasan jumlah pesanan valid oleh pembeli di beberapa toko berbeda di channel yang sama.
id.45: Menampilkan top 5 Channel SKU dan Master SKU produk teratas dari jumlah total penjualan (diambil dari nominal penjualan setelah diskon pada pesanan yang valid).
id.51:
Menampilkan total penjualan setelah diskon dari Channel SKU semua pesanan yang valid.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
id.52: Menampilkan total penjualan setelah diskon dari Master SKU pada pesanan manual + total penjualan setelah diskon semua Channel SKU yang sudah terikat dengan Master SKU (hanya untuk pesanan yang valid).
id.54:
Menampilkan total jumlah penjualan Channel SKU semua pesanan yang valid.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
id.55: Menampilkan total jumlah penjualan Master SKU pesanan manual + total jumlah penjualan semua Channel SKU setelah diskon yang sudah terikat dengan Master SKU (hanya untuk pesanan yang valid).
id.59:
Berdasarkan total pendapatan semua pesanan (termasuk pesanan dibatalkan).
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar.
Total Nominal Pesanan = Nominal Pesanan Valid + Nominal Pesanan Dibatalkan.
id.61:
Menampilkan akumulasi jumlah penjualan semua pesanan.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar.
Total Nominal Pesanan = Nominal Pesanan Valid + Nominal Pesanan Dibatalkan.
id.63:
Menampilkan total nominal pendapatan pesanan yang valid.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
id.65:
Menampilkan akumulasi jumlah penjualan dari pesanan yang valid.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
id.67: Menampilkan total nominal dari pesanan yang dibatalkan. Hanya menghitung pesanan dengan status 'dibatalkan'.
id.69:
Menampilkan akumulasi jumlah penjualan dari pesanan yang dibatalkan.
Hanya menghitung pesanan dengan status 'dibatalkan'.
id.71: Menampilkan jumlah dari nominal penjualan setelah diskon dari Master SKU pada pesanan manual + jumlah dari nominal penjualan setelah diskon dari semua Channel SKU yang sudah terikat dengan Master SKU (hanya untuk pesanan yang valid).
id.73: Menampilkan jumlah total penjualan dari Master SKU pada pesanan manual + total penjualan dari semua Channel SKU. (Hanya menghitung pesanan yang valid).
id.75:
Penjualan Unit berdasarkan Pengguna = Nominal Pesanan Valid / Pesanan Valid
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
id.77:
Jumlah total pengguna yang memiliki pesanan valid.
Termasuk pesanan dengan status Terima Pesanan, Perlu Diproses, Telah Diproses, Dalam Pengiriman, Selesai, Proses Batal, dan Gagal. Tidak termasuk pesanan dengan status Belum Bayar dan Batal.
id.86: Harga Rata-rata Pesanan Valid = Nominal Pesanan Valid / Pesanan Valid
id.87: Integrasi tokomu terlebih dahulu untuk melihat laporan analisis penjualan!
